name: PARTY BREAD
description:
PARTY BREAD is a Top Down Free-Moving Rythm game in which you have to move and press Arrows at the correct time to achieve a high score.

Gameplay can be both challenging or casual thanks to a difficulty setting that allows you to play casually or challenge yourself.

The game features the all awesome and totally not made up bread from a totally not made up company, PARTY BREAD! Giving you energy no other bread has and keeping you healthy in the way! Check out the game to know more! lol...

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Arrow Keys: Pressing Quick Time Event

Inspired (and totally not borrowed) by the awesome Disco minigame of Yakuza 0

Development time: 1 Month

Credits:

Martin Herrera (maisth)

Programmer, Artist, Writing, SFX Design

Additional Credits:
